Solver Utilities for CMRSS Package

Source: R/solvers.R
solver_available.Rd

The package supports two optimization solvers:

  • Gurobi: Commercial solver (requires license). Fast and robust.

  • HiGHS: Open-source solver. No license required, good performance.

Both solvers produce equivalent results for the same optimization problem. HiGHS is recommended for users without a Gurobi license. Check if a solver is available

Usage

solver_available(solver)

Arguments

solver

Character string: "gurobi" or "highs"

Value

Logical indicating if the solver is available

Details

This file contains optimization solver functions for solving the integer/linear programming problems in stratified randomized experiments. It supports both Gurobi and HiGHS solvers.

Examples

solver_available("highs")
solver_available("gurobi")
